messages.message: So I guess this means that the shared circle component should go to "features"?
Yes I guess so... it seems weird to have a full feature for it though! Although maybe there's a folder called "User" and we put components into it?
Resolution to this: I made it not depend on TMember and instead use a firstName and lastName and put it in `shared`. This way it's more generic anyways.
@Jessica Completed agree, this is the best way to do it :raised_hands:
